mapper.select: select * from SYS_USERSINFO where SID != #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND GONGSIID=#{gongsiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT * FROM SYS_USERSINFO ui LEFT JOIN SYS_GONGSIINFO gi ON ui.GONGSIID=gi.ID WHERE ui.SNAME=#{sname }
mapper.sql: SID, SNAME, SSEX, SPHOTO, SIDCARD, SADDRESS_HOME, SADDRESS_NOW, SXL, SZZMM, SSCHOOL, SPHONE, SPHONE_LINE, SCHAT_LINE, SSH_STATUS, SJOBID, SSTATUS, SDESCRIBE, GONGSIID, LASTTIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_USERSINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USERSINFO (SID, SNAME, SSEX, SPHOTO, SIDCARD, SADDRESS_HOME, SADDRESS_NOW, SXL, SZZMM, SSCHOOL, SPHONE, SPHONE_LINE, SCHAT_LINE, SSH_STATUS, SJOBID, SSTATUS, SDESCRIBE, GONGSIID, LASTTIME) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saddressHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saddressNow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphoneLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schatLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sshStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjobid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gongsiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update SYS_USERSINFO
SID = #{record.sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SNAME = #{record.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSEX = #{record.ssex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPHOTO = #{record.sphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIDCARD = #{record.sidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SADDRESS_HOME = #{record.saddressHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SADDRESS_NOW = #{record.saddressNow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXL = #{record.sxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SZZMM = #{record.szzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSCHOOL = #{record.sschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPHONE = #{record.sphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPHONE_LINE = #{record.sphoneLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHAT_LINE = #{record.schatLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSH_STATUS = #{record.sshStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJOBID = #{record.sjobid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SSTATUS = #{record.sstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDESCRIBE = #{record.sdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GONGSIID = #{record.gongsiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTTIME = #{record.lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update SYS_USERSINFO set SID = #{record.sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SNAME = #{record.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSEX = #{record.ssex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPHOTO = #{record.sphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIDCARD = #{record.sidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SADDRESS_HOME = #{record.saddressHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SADDRESS_NOW = #{record.saddressNow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXL = #{record.sxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SZZMM = #{record.szzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSCHOOL = #{record.sschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPHONE = #{record.sphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPHONE_LINE = #{record.sphoneLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHAT_LINE = #{record.schatLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSH_STATUS = #{record.sshStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SJOBID = #{record.sjobid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SSTATUS = #{record.sstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDESCRIBE = #{record.sdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GONGSIID = #{record.gongsiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASTTIME = #{record.lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
